resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103887</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103887</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974066</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Global Climates and Seasons. A Look at Temperature and Precipitation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Globale Klimata und Jahreszeiten. Ein Blick 
bei der Temperatur und beim Niederschlag</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Climats et saisons globaux. Un regard à la 
température et à la précipitation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Climas e estações globais. Um olhar na 
temperatura e na precipitação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Climi e stagioni globali. Uno sguardo alla 
temperatura ed alla precipitazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παγκόσμιες κλίματα και εποχές. Ένα βλέμμα στη 
θερμοκρασία και την πτώση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Climas y estaciones globales. Una mirada en 
la temperatura y la precipitación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Several factors affect a region's climate and the number and types of seasons it experiences. Here students explore colorful animations of annual changes in temperature and precipitation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einige Faktoren beeinflussen das Klima einer 
Region und die Zahl und die Typen Jahreszeiten es Erfahrungen. 
Hier erforschen Kursteilnehmer bunte Animationen der jährlichen
Änderungen in der Temperatur und im Niederschlag.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plusieurs facteurs affectent le climat d'une 
région et le nombre et les types de saisons il des expériences. 
Ici les étudiants explorent des animations colorées des 
changements annuels de la température et de la précipitation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diversos fatores afetam o clima de uma região e o
número e os tipos de estações ele experiências. Aqui os 
estudantes exploram animations coloridos de mudanças anuais na 
temperatura e na precipitação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parecchi fattori interessano il clima della 
regione ed il numero ed i tipi di stagioni esso esperienze. Qui 
gli allievi esplorano le animazioni colorful dei cambiamenti annuali 
nella temperatura ed in precipitazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάφοροι παράγοντες έχουν επιπτώσεις στο κλίμα μιας 
περιοχής και τον αριθμό και τους τύπους εποχών που δοκιμάζει. 
Εδώ οι σπουδαστές ερευνούν τις ζωηρόχρωμες ζωτικότητες των 
ετήσιων αλλαγών στη θερμοκρασία και της πτώσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Varios factores afectan el clima de una región y 
el número y los tipos de estaciones él las experiencias. Aquí
los estudiantes exploran animaciones coloridas de cambios anuales en 
temperatura y la precipitación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974066</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103887</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/global-climates-and-seasons-a-look-at-temperature-and-precipitation</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
